headline: HLT Q2 Deep Dive: Mixed U.S. Demand Offsets Global Growth, Development Pipeline Expands
summary: Hotel company Hilton (NYSE:HLT) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q2 CY2025, with sales up 6.3% year on year to $3.14 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.20 per share was 7.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
